item.title: Comment on Equality Act 2010 by JVM
item.description:
Solving for the equilibrium, optimal firm size shrinks because each firm will need to hire only workers with identical compensation.

In this case, there will be one firm to run retail stores and it will contract out to another firm to run the warehouses.
